author: GlaucusResearch
content: We are Short Delaware-Issued 2018 and 2019 Corporate Bonds of Rolta. Full report at http://t.co/Irym6qUXXd.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Based on the analysis presented in our report, we believe that Rolta has fabricated its reported capex in order to mask overstated EBITDA

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We value Rolta’s Delaware Bonds at recovery value of the offshore assets, which we estimate to be USD 0.16 on the dollar.
